dcterms:creator: N. Srivastava
E. Mansimov
R. Salakhutdinov
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset containing sequences of two handwritten digits bouncing inside a 64x64 frame, generated for the purpose of evaluating spatiotemporal sequence forecasting models.
dcterms:title: Moving-MNIST Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of radar echo intensities collected in Hong Kong from 2011 to 2013, specifically focusing on the top 97 rainy days to facilitate precipitation nowcasting research.
dcterms:title: Radar Echo Dataset
